content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Greetings Mr. Haoyu Wang from China. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start by presenting an initially high figure of 1200 Euros per month. However, I'm open to negotiating and finding a mutually agreeable price. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
